name: Cube Rush (Vangsguard)
description:
CUBE RUSH IS NOW HERE

Cube rush is a 3D platformer like Slope but alot more clean!

10+ Levels to play all getting harder and harder, so lets see how skilled you are :)

Being added soon:

  • Skins (Including a secret one..)
  • Menu & In-Game music
  • Level Select
  • More levels
  • Options menu
  • Dynamic camera (Can be turned off in options)
  • Explosion when dying (Can be turned off in the options)

(Disclaimer, this is a project purely made for fun as a hobby not meant to be thought as a serious indie game)
